name: py-aiocontextvars

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This library experimentally provides the missing asyncio support for the
contextvars backport library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-contextvars
dependencies.description:
This package implements a backport of Python 3.7 contextvars module (see
PEP 567) for Python 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-runner
dependencies.description: Invoke py.test as distutils command with dependency resolution.

dependent_to.name: py-loguru
dependent_to.description: Loguru is a library which aims to bring enjoyable logging in Python.
